E2T9AUD.original: ~z~At least you'll have a nice message on your gravestone. Mine will just say "Here lies unpopular fag."
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~至少你的墓碑上还能写得漂亮点。我的可能只有一句「讨人厌的死基佬安眠于此」。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~If we could throw every fucking blogger out a chopper, bro. Keep them fools in line.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~真想把这些臭写博客的都扔下去，兄弟。让他们不乱说话。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He's got every reason to believe some of the most unpleasant cats on the Eastern Seaboard.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~完全有理由怀疑东海岸最难缠的家伙

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~You're right. That could be the smart bet.
~z~What about that fucking greasy cabrone Rocco? he should be taking the shit for this, it aint us T.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~那那个臭傻逼Rocco呢？他才该背上这口大锅，不是我们，T。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Who cares about us? Gracie's safety has got to be our priority; she's an innocent.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~谁在乎我们啊？Gracie的安全是我们的首要任务。她是无辜的。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~What do you think we're doing on this outing? We're looking for Gracie.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~那你觉得我们出来干什么？我们要去找Gracie。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Strangely enough, that's exactly what we need to be.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~不得不说，我们现在就需要暴富。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~We could start an outsourcing company. We'd be rich overnight.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我们开个公司接这种活。一夜之间就能暴富。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~She gets a coup de grace after some half-cocked rescue attempt, and we're well and truly assfucked.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~万一她因为你个莽夫而一命呜呼，我们就等着菊花盛开吧。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~If he thinks he's paranoid now, it's nothing in comparison to the heat he'd feel if you ordered the death of a bosses girl.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~如果他是个多疑的人，那什么威胁都比不上绑架黑道千金而被全城追杀。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~No amount of pills would prepare you for that.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~那种情况嗑多少药片都不管用。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~This is where they keep the chopper.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~这就是他们停直升机的地方。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~So, T, hypothetically, what would happen if we did find Gracie? We going to storm in there and make these kidnappers pay?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~那个，T，问个问题，找到Gracie以后要干什么？直接冲进去，教训一顿绑匪吗？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~We just got to follow them. See if they take us anywhere interesting.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我们要跟踪他们。看看会不会找到什么有趣的地方。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Fuck, might just be heading down the block for a slice of pie.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~操，甚至只是去哪个区买水果派吃。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~You're the one who wants to start some armed offensive on the kidnappers of a mob skipper's daughter.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~是你说要跟绑架黑帮千金的犯人正面冲突的。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~are about to knock down his door and rip out his tongue. If he ain't fucking paranoid then he's fucking stupid.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~会冲进他的家门，割掉他的舌头。这都不怀疑一下，那他就是脑子进水了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~An innocent? Come on T. Her dad's one of the biggest mobsters in the city. He runs a family, can't he handle this?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~无辜？别傻了，T。她老爸是全城最大的黑帮头子之一，搞黑道家族的，摆平不了吗？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Aint we being held responsible for this shit anyway?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我们不是横竖都要背上这口黑锅吗？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~There's some lowlifes in Dukes who might be involved. Losers even by current mob standards, which is saying something.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~这事可能和Dukes那边的穷鬼有关系。几个以黑帮标准都算失败的穷鬼，这就能说明问题了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I don't know where he's going, you idiot. That's why we're following him.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我哪知道他去哪，你个傻瓜。所以我们才跟着他。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Nothing as stupid as ordering a hit on poor little Gracie Ancelotti.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~再蠢也蠢不过袭击可怜的Gracie Ancelotti。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~She comes back with ten fingers, ten toes, a smile on her face and a curse on her lips then we'll be fine.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~只要她没有缺胳膊少腿，活着回来还能骂上两句脏话，我们就不会有事。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Here's the Ancelotti chopper. Let's not screw it up as well.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~这就是Ancelotti的直升机。别把它撞坏了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Shit. Okay. Okay. I take your point. If you see him stopping let me know.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~操，好吧，好吧。你说的都对。他停下来了你跟我说一声。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~You should have shared your anti-anxiety pills with the Celebinator.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~当时你咋不给名人终结者分两粒抗焦虑药啊。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Thank you for sharing that image with me.
~z~Who knows what they could have done to that girl? She could be dead at the bottom of the West River now.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~谁知道他们会对她做什么？没准她已经被沉尸西河了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I can see he's going west. Where west?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我看得到他在往西走。西边什么地方？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~What do you mean? If we're going to get Gracie back?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~你什么意思？我们不是要去救Gracie吗？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Okay, bro. He might suspect we're chasing him. Let's hope he starts panicking and does something stupid.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，兄弟。他可能会怀疑我们在追他。希望他已经慌了，然后再干点蠢事吧。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Then he's probably going to see us, isn't he? The first thing a paranoid man looks for is a chopper.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~那不就要被他发现了吗？多疑的人肯定会注意到直升机的。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Okay. It's a shot in the dark, but it might work.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~好吧。跟摸瞎差不多，说不定就成了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~So let's hope he ain't as stupid as we've been lead to believe.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~只能希望他没有我们想的那么傻了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~My pleasure. Now no hero shit, Lou. Promise me. This is just a reconnaissance mission.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~不客气。现在不要逞英雄，Lou。答应我。这只是个侦察行动。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Or she could be driving some son of a bitch kidnapper crazy.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~也可能她已经把那个王八蛋绑匪气疯了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~You'll see him stopping too, bro. You ain't going to sleep on me are you.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~你也能看到他停车啊，兄弟。你不会是想睡觉吧？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I may be semi-suicidal, but I'm not completely stupid, Luis.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我是有点自杀倾向，但是我还没那么傻，Luis。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Good. Because we're going to need to really hold shit together for a while if we want to survive this shit.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~很好。如果我们还想活命，接下来最好团结起来。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He ain't trying to lose us, Tone. We're in a chopper.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~他别想甩掉我们，Tone。我们在直升机上。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~And not in a good way - prison style! Not gang-bang with a boy band style.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~而且会很粗暴，监狱里那种！不是和男子乐队开淫趴那种。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Gracie's got my backing over some chump hood from Dukes.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~有我从Dukes的三脚猫暴徒手里保护Gracie。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He's just kidnapped a mob boss' daughter.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~他才刚绑架了黑帮老大的女儿。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Yes. This is a purely selfish act. Are you happy now?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~是的，完全是出于自私。你现在高兴了？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Okay. I need your help, Luis. You're all I've got left. You happy now? I said it.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~好吧。我需要你的帮助，Luis。你是我所剩的一切了。满意了吧？我承认了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~You think I could go to sleep at a moment like this?
~z~How are we going to get out of this, Tone?
~z~I wouldn't wish that nasal whining voice on the worst guy out there.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我可不想听她用那个哼唧哼唧的鼻音骂人。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~The diamonds. He says it's got something to do with the diamonds and Gracie hanging out with us.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~那些钻石。他说事情和钻石有关，而且Gracie经常和我们一块出去。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Of course I'm calm. I'm really calm. Why wouldn't I be calm?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我当然很冷静。我超冷静的。有什么理由不冷静吗？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Take us over to Cerveza Heights. Their house is over there.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我们去Cerveza Heights。他们的房子在那儿。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~So, this isn't about Gracie, it's about saving our own asses?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~所以，这不是为了Gracie，而是为了救我们自己的小命？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He's blaming us for this whole thing. Either we get her back or we're dead.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~他认为这件事我们全责。救不回他女儿，我们就没命了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~There's a lot of shit west of Dukes. Could be Algonquin. Could head all the way over to Alderney.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~Dukes西边的东西可太多了。也许是Algonquin，也没准他一路开到了Alderney。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Don't fuck with the Tony Prince empire baby. That's what's up!
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~别和Tony Prince帝国做对，宝贝。那就是你的下场！

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~You could marry a billionairess. That might get us out of our problems.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~要么你去傍个富婆，这样我们的问题就都解决了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~We should go and get the Ancelottis' chopper. It's just on the other side of the Booth Tunnel.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我们去开Ancelotti家族的直升机。它在Booth隧道的另一边。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Even after half a nostril full of blow I'm hearing rotor blades and squinting at the sky.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~就算是吸了一鼻子白粉，我也能听到螺旋桨的声音，然后抬头看天。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~There are some punks in Dukes that might have a link to this thing. We're going to follow them and see if they lead us to our girl.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~有几个在Dukes的逼崽子可能和绑架有关。我们要跟踪他们，看看能不能找到Gracie。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~That's definitely interesting. How the fuck did he get that in his head? I barely know the girl.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~那还挺有意思的。他他妈是怎么想的？我跟他女儿又不熟。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I dont know, you did just point a gun at me. You nearly just shot yourself.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~不知道，你刚才还拿枪指我。还差点开枪自杀。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, strangely I am. Now that I've realized I'm being blackmailed into doing this, it's become a lot clearer.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~是，这样是高兴了。现在我知道自己是被逼着做这种事的，一下子清楚多了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~What's the first thing they're gonna do? You've seen the movies. They'll cap her.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~他们会怎么做？你看过电影的，当然是撕票了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~What? We've got to get her back, alright.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~什么？我们一定要救她回来的，好吧。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I wish I had your principles, genius.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我倒是希望我能像你那么有原则，聪明鬼。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He might not be going west at all, might be heading over to the East Borough Bridge so he can get himself up to Bohan.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~也可能根本不是西边，说不定是去东区大桥，要去的地方在Bohan。
~z~你的意思是「超大声地哭着求救」。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He's just going for a drive, T.
~z~All this shit piling down on top of us. How are we going to get out? Have we got a plan?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~压在我们头上的这么多破事。要怎么解决？有什么计划吗？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Okay, bro. Let's hope for the best.
~z~You ain't even semi-suicidal, T. You're just over-dramatic. I wouldn't be surprised if that gun was just a movie prop.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~你都不是有自杀倾向，T。你是太过浮夸了。你说刚才那把枪是电影道具我都信。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I don't know. We could play the lottery, start a little ponzi scheme,
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我不知道啊。我们可以去买彩票、搞一个庞氏骗局、

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~It's the diamonds, Lou. Rocco's had a word with him.
~z~What we gonna do with a chopper?

E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~好的，长官。仔细观察，小心汇报。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~What he going back through the park for? He onto us?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~他怎么开回中心公园了？被他发现了？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I wasn't talking about that. I mean, I really want to get Gracie back, but at the end of the day that ain't our main problem.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我说的不是这个。我是说，我也想把Gracie救回来，但是说到底，那不是我们的主要问题。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~You'd think you'd know enough with all the shit we been in to take the safety off a gun before you use it.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~经历了这么多你觉得你行了，结果开枪之前还是上着保险？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~The Ancelottis said I should use their chopper. It's at the heliport on top of the entrance of the Booth Tunnel.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~Ancelotti家族的人让我们用直升机，就停在Booth隧道出口的正上方。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I think that's the place we're looking for.
~z~All I'm saying is there are bigger problems we got to deal with. If Gracie came back tomorrow, we'd still be looking down the gun.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~总而言之，我们还有更大的问题要解决。就算Gracie明天回来了，我们的危机依然存在。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Her old man said something interesting to me, by the way.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~她老爹还跟我说了一些有意思的东西。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Being tangentially blamed for an abduction I can just about handle.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~如果只是一个绑架，那我还能够摆平。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He's cutting back on himself. I thought he was heading west.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~他怎么往回开了。我还以为他要去西边。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Okay, alright. But which way do you think he's heading?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，行。但你觉得他可能去哪儿？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~buy some cheap diamonds and try to sell them on at a profit. Oh wait, we've tried that and it's not going so well.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~买点便宜钻石去投机倒把。噢，等下，钻石买过了，结果不太顺利。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~We've been in enough shit recently for me to carry something a little bit more dangerous than a prop gun.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~最近经历了这么多事，总得带点比道具枪有用的真家伙吧。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I don't know. I'm sorry. I'm stressed alright.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我也不知道。对不起。我现在压力很大，好吧？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I think that's their car, Lou. The red one. Let's follow it.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~应该就是那辆车，Lou。红色的那辆。咱们跟上去。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Okay, bro. Where we looking for this girl then?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~好了，兄弟。我们一会儿去哪找她？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~You'll throw a guy out a chopper but you won't go for a ride in one?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~你能把人从直升机上扔下去，自己却不敢坐飞机？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Me fucking crazy? Thats a bit rich coming from you.
~z~The heat would be on us as well, Lou.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~然而我们也要被全城追杀了，Lou。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Oh, they'll "cap" her will they, Mr Streetwise Dangerous Motherfucker?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~噢，他们会「撕票」是吧，街头卧龙先生？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~I'm serious Lou, most of the girls in this city have fallen in love with you at least once, how come you can't manage to find a rich one.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我认真的，Lou。城里有几个姑娘没被你迷住过，怎么会找不到富婆呢？
~z~那个啊？噢，是的。我挺好的，自在得很。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Is he going faster. I think he's going faster. He's trying to lose us.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~他是在加速吗？他好像在加速。他想甩掉我们。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~We got debts, who knows how many people want us dead. At some point we're gonna have to start getting selfish...
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~我们欠了债，谁知道有多少人想让我们死。某种意义上，我们必须要自私一点...

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~The place we're checking out is over in Cerveza Heights.
~z~Well, now he's heading east. We won't lose him, man. We're cool.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~现在他往东边去了。我们不会跟丢的，没问题的。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Fair point. I'll get a post-it note for the next time. "Disengage before suicide attempt."
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~有道理。下次我就先贴个便签：「自杀之前解除保险」。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He's holding us responsible for the whole fucking mess.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~整件事他都怪罪到我们头上了。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Don't doubt the imagination of a man on the brink.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~不要怀疑狗急跳墙的人的想象力。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He's speeding up. He's trying to lose us.
~z~You got any ideas where we might start doing that? It's a big city, Tone.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~想好从里哪开始找了吗？自由城很大的，Tone。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Oh yeah, I've already been pimped off once, T, and I nearly got killed because of it.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~是吗，上次你就让我出卖色相了，T。我差点还因此出事。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~No. I don't actually. I didn't even take an anti-anxiety and you know how I feel about flying.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~没，我真没带。我连抗焦虑药都没带，你也知道我坐飞机很慌的。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~Okay. So we head over there and do what? Land on the roof and ask them where they got Gracie?
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~好吧。那我们去了以后干什么？降落到屋顶，然后问他们Gracie被关在哪儿了？

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~That red car is leaving. Follow it.
~z~This is Liberty City man. There must be twenty helicopters in this airspace at any given time.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~这可是自由城啊。随时都有二十多架直升机在天上盘旋。

E2T9AUD.original: ~z~He ain't gonna think this chopper's got anything to do with him.
E2T9AUD.translated: ~z~他不会认为我们的直升机是冲着他来的。
